translation.main-banner-text: From startups to holdings, you can trust our professional team for the deployment of various complex IT products, and for the preparation of ready-to-use websites, mobile, or web applications
translation.main-business-support-item3: Creation of mobile applications and websites
translation.main-business-support-card-text1: Together, we determine your product goals based on the needs of your business (customer) and future vision. We deliver solutions to users and offer solutions for future stages if needed.
translation.main-business-support-card-text2: We formalize the required solutions based on the Agile methodology.
translation.main-business-support-card-text3: We provide solutions tailored to your user and, if necessary, create solutions for the future.
translation.main-business-support-card-text4: Based on your short and long-term goals, we prepare a clear business model. Identifying your needs, we formalize requirements and design with suitable solutions.
translation.main-business-support-card-text5: We deploy your solutions according to your preferences, using an automated development pipeline or CI/CD.
translation.interesting-question1: How much does it cost for the development and design of my website?
translation.interesting-question2: What is the duration of the business process?
translation.interesting-question3: What types of companies do you work with?
translation.interesting-question4: What is included in e-commerce services?
translation.about-banner-text: We build a cross-functional team of excellent managers, QA specialists, and specialized web developers and coders. Our team has many years of experience in creating and developing web solutions and they are the core of C2C.
translation.technical-support-text: We provide long-term technical support on a regular basis after delivering projects.
translation.reliable-work-text: The high-quality service we offer to our clients guarantees reliable work.
translation.our-services-title-text:
We specialize in complex projects with numerous integrations, roles, and processes.
 That's why we are chosen to develop microservice solutions, 
 loaded systems, and omnichannel platforms.
translation.blog-title-text:
Our goal is to make knowledge 
 accessible to everyone
translation.contact-us-title-text:
A team of professionals is ready to help you 
 achieve your business goals.
